headline: LYB to discuss first-quarter results Friday, April 25, 2025
summary: HOUSTON and LONDON, March 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LyondellBasell (NYSE: LYB), a leader in the global chemical industry, will announce its first-quarter 2025 financial results before the U.S. market opens Friday, April 25, followed by a webcast and teleconference to discuss the results at 11 a.m. EDT. Teleconference and webcast detailsFriday, April 25, 202511 a.m. EDTHosted by David Kinney, head of investor relationsAccess the webcast 10 to 15 minutes prior to the start of the call at www.ly
